description: Climate variability refers to variations in the mean state and other statistics (such as standard deviations, the occurrence of extremes, etc.) of theï¿½climateï¿½on all spatial and temporal scales beyond that of individual weather events. Variability may be due to natural internal processes within theï¿½climate systemï¿½(internal variability), or to variations in natural orï¿½anthropogenicï¿½externalï¿½forcingï¿½(external variability).
